    G

    GameModel - Class in model
    Primary game model that holds the entire game state and logic.
    GameModel(KeyHandler) - Constructor for class model.GameModel
    Constructs the GameModel with the provided KeyHandler.
    gameOver - Variable in class model.GameModel
     
    GamePanel - Class in model
    JPanel responsible for rendering the game view.
    GamePanel(GameModel) - Constructor for class model.GamePanel
    Constructs a GamePanel bound to the given GameModel.
    gamethread - package gamethread
     
    Gamethread - Class in gamethread
    The Gamethread class represents the main game loop responsible for updating the game state and refreshing the game's visual display.
    Gamethread(GameModel, GamePanel) - Constructor for class gamethread.Gamethread
    Creates a new game loop thread bound to the given model and panel.
    getBlocksImage() - Method in class model.GamePanel
    Loads tiles and border images used to draw the map.
